about_the_game:
Halloween 5 Book

This Halloween-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Halloween is back for round 5 and it's just as spooktacular!

Dive into this annual-themed book...if you dare!

Contents

The Halloween 5 book unlocks the following images:
  • Jack-o'-Lantern Mushroom - 24x24
  • Reaper - 32x32
  • Pumpkin Waiter - 35x78
  • Bat - 40x40
  • Mailbox - 51x91
  • Ghost - 59x88
  • Trick or Treat - 64x69
  • Candy - 82x82
  • Snail Sorcerer - 92x62
  • Frankenstein - 98x122
  • Ghost in the Window - 100x100
  • Dracula's Photograph - 100x100
  • Skeletal Music - 103x111
  • Werewolf - 120x131
  • Keyhole - 122x147
  • Pumpkin House - 142x122
  • Scarecrow - 142x142
  • Pumpkin Pals - 148x67
  • Black Cat - 150x126
  • Alone in the Woods - 150x150

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Halloween 5 Pack

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
